headline: Looking For Yields: Avista, Regions Financial, And Duke Energy Are Consistent Moneymakers
summary: Companies with a long history of paying dividends and consistently hiking them remain appealing to income-focused investors. Avista, Regions Financial, and Duke Energy have rewarded shareholders for years and recently announced dividend increases. ...
